rules: Use the search bar in the middle to search for a person and send roses. And yes, you can send roses to both the genders. ;)
Pour your heart out in the message area and send it. Remember this is valentine's week, and everybody hates hateful messages.
There is a shout box on the right that supports emoticons and link-recognition to share images and play youtube videos in the app itself.
Enjoy the popularity board by looking at the rose count of your friends.
Try not to use explicit content because we have a moderation system.
Do not open more than 5 tabs or you won't be able to make shouts from other tabs.
